summary: Admin dashboard rebuild to remove role-based guards and use a login-only AdminBypass wrapper for stable rendering.
architectural_notes: Admin routes must not use role-based guards for now; use a single AdminBypass that only checks authentication (logged-in) and redirects to login otherwise.
Admin dashboard UI should prioritize minimal, stable components and a simple layout during this rebuild.
known_issues: Admin dashboard crashes due to SafeAdminGate role guard.

existing_features.title: Remove `SafeAdminGate` and any role-based route guard logic from all `/admin` routes, and replace it with a new `AdminBypass` wrapper that only requires the user to be logged in.

Implement `frontend/src/components/auth/AdminBypass.tsx` as a login-only wrapper: it must not check roles; it must redirect unauthenticated users to the login route; it must render children for authenticated users.

Rebuild `frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardPage.tsx` to use a minimal, safe, and stable layout (avoid complex/fragile UI patterns) while preserving core functionality (vendor list + wallet due + enable/disable outlet).

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove SafeAdminGate and all role-based route guards from admin routes
Implement AdminBypass wrapper: require logged-in user, redirect to login if not logged in, otherwise render admin pages (no role checks)
Rebuild admin dashboard using minimal safe components with a simple, stable layout (no role verification logic for now)

projectName: Replace SafeAdminGate with login-only AdminBypass and stabilize admin routes/dashboard
